com.theif519.sakoverlay.Core.Misc

Class MeasureTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.theif519.utils.Misc.MeasureTools

  • public final class MeasureTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by theif519 on 11/23/2015.

    This Utility tool is used to aid in the arduous task of moving and resizing scaled views. They serve not only as reusable, but also readable. They offer ways to scale (and unscale) views and sizes.
